ontologies-from-analytes.title: Retrieve Ontologies from Input Analytes (Metabolites)
ontologies-from-analytes.description: Enter a list of metabolites. IDs should be prepended by ID source (e.g. kegg:C00412). See below for supported sources.

metabolites-from-ontologies.title: Retrieve Analytes (Metabolites) from Ontologies
metabolites-from-ontologies.description: Enter ontology(ies) and retrieve corresponding analytes (metabolites).

analytes-from-pathways.title: Retrieve Analytes From Input Pathway(s)
analytes-from-pathways.examples: De Novo Triacylglycerol Biosynthesis, sphingolipid metabolism
analytes-from-pathways.description: Retrieve analytes (genes/proteins, metabolites) by pathway. Enter exact pathway name(s).

pathways-from-analytes.title: Retrieve Pathways From Input Analyte(s)
pathways-from-analytes.description: Retrieve pathway(s) for a given analyte(s). IDs should be prepended by ID source (e.g. hmdb:HMDB0000122). See below for supported sources.

analyteid-types.title: Retrieve Analyte ID types
analyteid-types.description: Retrieve analyte ID types to be used as prefixes for other RaMP function calls.

common-reaction-analytes.title: Retrieve Analytes Involved in the Same Reaction
common-reaction-analytes.description: Retrieve Analytes Involved in the Same Reaction. IDs should be prepended by ID source (e.g. hmdb:HMDB0000122). See below for supported sources.

classes-from-metabolites.title: Retrieve Chemical Classes from Input Metabolites
classes-from-metabolites.examples: hmdb:HMDB0000056, hmdb:HMDB0000439, hmdb:HMDB0000479, hmdb:HMDB0000532, hmdb:HMDB0001015, hmdb:HMDB0001138, hmdb:HMDB0029159, hmdb:HMDB0029412, hmdb:HMDB0034365, hmdb:HMDB0035227, hmdb:HMDB0007973, hmdb:HMDB0008057, hmdb:HMDB0011211
classes-from-metabolites.description: Retrieve chemical class information (from ClassyFire and LIPID MAPS) for input metabolite IDs. IDs should be prepended by ID source (e.g. hmdb:HMDB0000122). See below for supported sources..

properties-from-metabolites.title: Retrieve Chemical Properties from Input Metabolites
properties-from-metabolites.examples: hmdb:HMDB0000056, hmdb:HMDB0000439, hmdb:HMDB0000479, hmdb:HMDB0000532, hmdb:HMDB0001015, hmdb:HMDB0001138, hmdb:HMDB0029159, hmdb:HMDB0029412, hmdb:HMDB0034365, hmdb:HMDB0035227, hmdb:HMDB0007973, hmdb:HMDB0008057, hmdb:HMDB0011211
properties-from-metabolites.description: Retrieve chemical properties (smiles, inchi_key, inchi_key_prefix, inchi, mw, monoisotop_mass, formula, common_name) from input metabolites. IDs should be prepended by ID source (e.g. hmdb:HMDB0000122). See below for supported sources.

chemical-enrichment.title: Perform Chemical Class Enrichment
chemical-enrichment.examples: hmdb:HMDB0000056, hmdb:HMDB0000439, hmdb:HMDB0000479, hmdb:HMDB0000532, hmdb:HMDB0001015, hmdb:HMDB0001138, hmdb:HMDB0029159, hmdb:HMDB0029412, hmdb:HMDB0034365, hmdb:HMDB0035227, hmdb:HMDB0007973, hmdb:HMDB0008057, hmdb:HMDB0011211, hmdb:HMDB0001085, hmdb:HMDB0002122, hmdb:HMDB0002685, hmdb:HMDB0004241, hmdb:HMDB0005079, hmdb:HMDB0006245
chemical-enrichment.description: Perform chemical class enrichment on ClassyFire and LIPIDMAPS classes. IDs should be prepended by ID source (e.g. hmdb:HMDB0000122). See below for supported sources.

pathway-enrichment.title: Perform Pathway Enrichment
pathway-enrichment.examples: hmdb:HMDB0000033, hmdb:HMDB0000052, hmdb:HMDB0000094, hmdb:HMDB0000161, hmdb:HMDB0000168, hmdb:HMDB0000191, hmdb:HMDB0000201, chemspider:10026, hmdb:HMDB0006059, Chemspider:6405,CAS:5657-19-2,hmdb:HMDB0002511, chemspider:20171375, CAS:133-32-4, CAS:5746-90-7, CAS:477251-67-5, hmdb:HMDB0000695, chebi:15934, CAS:838-07-3, hmdb:HMDBP00789, hmdb:HMDBP00283, hmdb:HMDBP00284,hmdb:HMDBP00850
pathway-enrichment.description: Perform Pathway Enrichment. IDs should be prepended by ID source (e.g. hmdb:HMDB0000122). Input analyte IDs can be a mix of genes/proteins or metabolites. See below for supported sources.
